name: Placement Physics Test
description:
A small physics and placement demo I whipped up over the span of an hour or two for a prototype of a group project senior year. We never ended up using this system for our game, but I like it enough to let it sit here instead of collect dust on an old hard drive. The sound of blocks colliding can be a little loud, so you might want to tune down the browser volume a bit.

Controls:

Left click: place selection / grab and hold block

G: toggle between placing and grabbing

R: Restart (useful for if you've made a bit of a mess)
